site.about.title: My Journey - MYAROU
site.about.hero.description: An atypical journey, from the basketball court to training rooms, driven by a single mission: unleashing the potential of African youth.
site.about.profile.p1: My journey began on basketball courts in Benin, where I learned the values of teamwork, discipline, and perseverance. These values accompanied me to Villanova University in the USA, where I excelled both on the court and in the classroom.
site.about.profile.p2: My professional career in Europe allowed me to discover different cultures and refine my vision of leadership. But it was by observing the challenges facing African youth that I found my true calling: creating opportunities for transformation.
site.about.profile.p3: Today, through MY BARIKA, I put my experience at the service of those who want to make a difference. Because excellence is not a privilege, it is a choice we can all make.
site.about.journey.title: Key Milestones of My Journey
site.about.journey.description: A journey marked by passion, learning, and commitment to excellence.
site.about.journey.item1.title: Birth of a Passion
site.about.journey.item1.desc: Discovery of basketball and development of fundamental values: discipline, teamwork, and self-transcendence.
site.about.journey.item2.title: Academic and Athletic Excellence
site.about.journey.item2.desc: High-level training in the United States, combining athletic performance and academic success in an environment of excellence.
site.about.journey.item3.title: Evolution in Europe
site.about.journey.item3.desc: Enriching professional experience in Europe, discovery of new cultures, and affirmation of leadership.
site.about.journey.item4.title: Founder of MY BARIKA
site.about.journey.item4.desc: Creation of a transformation platform to accompany African youth towards excellence and leadership.
site.about.video.title: Discover My Story in Video
site.about.video.description: An authentic testimony of my journey, my challenges, and my vision for Africa.
site.about.values.title: The Values That Guide Me
site.about.values.description: Forged by experience, these principles are at the heart of every action and decision.
site.about.values.excellence.title: Excellence
site.about.values.excellence.desc: Aiming for excellence in everything we undertake, never accepting mediocrity as a standard. It is a daily commitment to quality and continuous improvement.
site.about.values.solidarity.title: Solidarity
site.about.values.solidarity.desc: Believing in the power of the collective and mutual aid to transform communities and build the future. Together, we are stronger and go further.
site.about.values.authenticity.title: Authenticity
site.about.values.authenticity.desc: Staying true to one's values and origins, while opening up to the world and its opportunities. Authenticity is the foundation of trust and mutual respect.
site.about.values.impact.title: Sustainable Impact
site.about.values.impact.desc: Creating profound and lasting change in communities. Every action must contribute to a positive and measurable transformation for future generations.
site.about.vision.quote: I dream of an Africa where every young person has the means to realize their potential, where excellence is the norm and not the exception, where our leaders are trained to sustainably transform our communities.
site.about.cta.title: Let's Team Up to Transform Africa
site.about.cta.description: Whether you are a student, professional, or entrepreneur, join a movement that believes in your potential and gives you the tools to succeed.
site.blog.hero.description: Leadership, personal development, entrepreneurship and much more. Explore our content to inspire and progress.

site.contact.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
site.contact.faq.description: Quickly find answers to common questions
site.contact.faq.q1.answer: Yes! All our blog articles are free. We believe in sharing knowledge and want to make information accessible to everyone. Some premium content or personalized coaching programs may be paid.
site.contact.faq.q2.answer: Certificates are available for our personalized coaching programs and some specific workshops. Contact us for more information on our certified programs.
site.contact.faq.q3: Can I volunteer for MY BARIKA?
site.contact.faq.q3.answer: Absolutely! We are always looking for passionate volunteers. Contact us via the form specifying your interest in volunteering.
site.contact.faq.q4.answer: Yes! We regularly organize workshops, conferences, and sports camps in Africa and Europe. Follow us on our social networks to be informed of upcoming events.

site.modal.cgu.title: Terms of Service
site.modal.cgu.intro.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
site.modal.cgu.intro.content: By accessing and using the MYAROU website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our site.
site.modal.cgu.usage.title: 2. Use of the Site
site.modal.cgu.usage.intro: You agree to use the site only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe on the rights of others. It is notably prohibited to:
site.modal.cgu.usage.list1: Publish offensive, defamatory, or illegal content
site.modal.cgu.usage.list2: Attempt unauthorized access to the site or systems
site.modal.cgu.usage.list3: Use the site to transmit viruses or malicious code
site.modal.cgu.usage.list4: Collect personal data of other users
site.modal.cgu.ip.title: 3. Intellectual Property
site.modal.cgu.ip.content: All content present on the site (texts, images, logos, videos) is protected by copyright and belongs to MYAROU or its partners. Any reproduction, distribution, or use without prior authorization is strictly prohibited.
site.modal.cgu.liability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
site.modal.cgu.liability.content: MYAROU strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information but does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or relevance of the content. We cannot be held liable for direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the site.
site.modal.cgu.modifications.title: 5. Modifications
site.modal.cgu.modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Modifications will take effect immediately upon posting on the site. It is your responsibility to check these terms regularly.
site.modal.cgu.law.title: 6. Applicable Law
site.modal.cgu.law.content: These Terms are governed by French law. Any dispute relating to their interpretation or execution falls under the jurisdiction of French courts.
site.modal.privacy.collection.title: 1. Data Collection
site.modal.privacy.collection.intro: We collect the following types of personal data:
site.modal.privacy.usage.title: 2. Data Usage
site.modal.privacy.usage.intro: Your personal data is used to:
site.modal.privacy.usage.list2: Respond to your requests and questions
site.modal.privacy.usage.list3: Send you information about our activities (with your consent)
site.modal.privacy.protection.title: 3. Data Protection
site.modal.privacy.protection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction. Our servers are secure and sensitive data is encrypted.
site.modal.privacy.sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
site.modal.privacy.sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. We may share your data only with service providers who help us operate our site, in compliance with confidentiality.
site.modal.privacy.rights.title: 5. Your Rights
site.modal.privacy.rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
site.modal.privacy.rights.list1: Right of access to your data
site.modal.privacy.rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: contact@myarou.com
site.modal.privacy.retention.title: 6. Data Retention
site.modal.privacy.retention.content: We retain your personal data as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with our legal obligations. Contact data is kept for up to 3 years after your last interaction with us.
site.modal.cookies.what.title: What is a cookie?
site.modal.cookies.what.content: A cookie is a small text file placed on your computer when you visit a website. It allows remembering information about your navigation and improving your user experience.
site.modal.cookies.types.title: Types of Cookies Used
site.modal.cookies.essential.title: üç™ Essential Cookies
site.modal.cookies.essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function. They allow the use of basic functionalities like secure navigation. They cannot be disabled.
site.modal.cookies.analytics.title: üìä Analytics Cookies
site.modal.cookies.analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our site by collecting and reporting information anonymously (Google Analytics).
site.modal.cookies.functional.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Functional Cookies
site.modal.cookies.functional.content: These cookies allow the site to remember choices you make (such as your language or region) and provide enhanced features.
site.modal.cookies.advertising.title: üéØ Advertising Cookies
site.modal.cookies.advertising.content: We do not currently use advertising cookies on our site.
site.modal.cookies.duration.title: Retention Period
site.modal.cookies.duration.list1: Session cookies: deleted when the browser is closed
site.modal.cookies.duration.list2: Persistent cookies: kept for up to 13 months maximum
site.modal.cookies.manage.title: Manage Your Cookies
site.modal.cookies.manage.intro: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time:
site.modal.cookies.manage.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Disabling certain cookies may affect the functioning of the site.

Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the site elements is prohibited, unless with prior written authorization from MYAROU.
site.modal.legal.data.title: Personal Data
site.modal.legal.data.content: In accordance with the Data Protection Act of January 6, 1978, as amended, and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and object to personal data concerning you. To exercise these rights, contact us at: contact@myarou.com
